General.Name: Inner Mongolia Xinhua Distribution Group Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Inner Mongolia Xinhua Distribution Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the wholesale and retail of publications, stationery products, sporting goods and equipment, jewelry, handicrafts and collectibles, teaching materials and aids, educational equipment, and audio-visual products. It operates various sales outlets. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Hohhot, China.
